response.overview: Benjamin Franklin Gates and Abigail Chase re-team with Riley Poole and, now armed with a stack of long-lost pages from John Wilkes Booth's diary, Ben must follow a clue left there to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
response.tagline: The greatest adventure history has ever revealed.
response.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
